notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Emma England to Johanna Danielsen: Seeley Avenue and Ainslie Street. Price, $2,200.
T. N. Enright to Sam S. Nelson: Evans Avenue and 63rd Street. Price, $7,530.
J. C. Anderson to J. A. Nelson: Morgan and 59th Streets. Price, $6,200.
Albert W. Ross to Albert B. Halvorsen: 2628 Cortland Street. Price, $2,000.
Martin F. Serum to John K. Hass: Sawyer Avenue and Huron Street. Price, $13,000.
E. J. Carlson to O. A. Messick: Springfield Avenue and Indiana Street.
Emil Wiberg to H. F. Hansen: Hamlin Avenue and Iowa Street. Price, $5,400.
Jacob A. Hansen to Tillie E. Kleis: North and Central Park Avenue. Price, $1,500.
Hans P. Hansen to S. E. Morris: Maplewood Avenue and Le Moyne Street. Price, $5,530.
Chas. S. Nelson to A. B. Nelson: 50th Court and Iowa Street. Price, $2,800.
